Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry to disturb you this early, but I had
some news I figured you'd like to hear about as
soon as possible.
<PAGE>
Starting today, we have a new service available
through the Guild.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
This new service is called <BLUE>StreetPass</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
If you sign up to <BLUE>activate StreetPass</BLUE>,
anyone you pass by who has a Nintendo 3DS
will be able to visit our town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Visitors who have also signed up for StreetPass
will be able to tour the town, of course.
<PAGE>
And if you talk with visitors, you'll be able to see
what was happening on your farm when they
were visiting.
<PAGE>
If you happen to be keeping two separate journal
entries, you need not worry -- the visitors will
come to both towns.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, would you like to sign up for StreetPass?

<RED>NOTE: You may also do this at the guild.</RED>

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent. Let me just activate StreetPass...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, StreetPass has been
officially activated.
<PAGE>
To make use of StreetPass, make sure that
wireless communication is enabled on your
Nintendo 3DS.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We can also sign you up for StreetPass at the
guild counter, so if you'd like to activate it later,
you can do so from there.
<PAGE>
All you need to do is speak to me at the counter
and select <BLUE>Activate StreetPass</BLUE>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll send some literature on the benefits of
StreetPass to your bookshelf. If you have any
questions, it should be able to answer them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I must be going. If you would pardon
me, please.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you choose to sign up for StreetPass and then
encounter another player over StreetPass, please
be aware of the following:
<PAGE>
<RED>Your character's name, your animals' names and
your farm name will be visible to your StreetPass
partners.</RED>
<PAGE>
<RED>NOTE: If an animal's name includes a number, it
will be displayed as a "*" to your StreetPass
partners.</RED>
<PAGE>
If you do not wish to use the StreetPass
function, please do not sign up for StreetPass.
<PAGE>
Additionally, if you choose to sign up for
StreetPass, it will not be activated until you've
written about it in your journal.
<PAGE>
When StreetPass is activated, what is visible to
your StreetPass partners will be updated each
time you write in your journal.
<PAGE>
And finally, StreetPass will continue to function
even after you have shut off this game.
<BLUE>StreetPass</BLUE> has been added to my shelf.
